review: Swing and a miss again, Google.  You brainstorm something with great potential and functionality and produce a nice product, but then, when there's hicups and problems with it, instead of working hard to actually fine tune the product, your nerds crunch the numbers and decide it isn't worth the time investment and so never quite make anything perfect and move onto the next thing.  Perfect example in the Chromecast: use it long enough and you'll find the connection breaks with your casting device.  You have to reset the CC to get it reconnected.  Figure it out, Google.
